evidence.text: A preliminary injunction is granted as follows: (1) The Agency Defendants and Agency Head Defendants and their officers… are preliminarily enjoined from implementing or enforcing against plaintiffs… Section 2 of Executive Order 14251.

extracted.value: Granted a preliminary injunction against the government’s implementation of Section 2 of EO 14251.

evidence.text: We grant the government’s request for a stay of the injunction pending appeal.
We grant the government’s request for a stay of the injunction pending appeal.

extracted.value: Granted the government’s request for a stay of the injunction pending appeal.

evidence.text: On July 8, 2025, the district court denied the government’s motion for a stay pending appeal.
On July 8, 2025, the district court denied the government’s motion for a stay pending appeal.

extracted.value: Denied the government’s motion for a stay pending appeal.

evidence.text: We grant the government’s request for an administrative stay pending our consideration of the emergency motion. On July 7, 2025, we granted the government’s request for an administrative stay pending our consideration of the emergency motion. On July 8, 2025, the district court denied the government’s motion for a stay pending appeal. We now grant the government’s emergency motion for a stay of the injunction pending appeal.

extracted.value: Granted an administrative stay pending consideration of the emergency motion.
